titleStmt.title: An answer to Mr. Stephens's sermon preach'd before the Honorable House of Commons at St. Margaret's Church in Westminster, January the 30th 1699/1700 by a gentleman who took the said sermon in short-hand.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman who took the said sermon in short-hand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the use of the Calves-Head Club, in order to their conversion,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
